query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS apps (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  app_id VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  app_secret VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  package_name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  icon VARCHAR(255),
  status INT DEFAULT 1,
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  deleted_at DATETIME DEFAULT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HmF555sZ6wXsVo.885fbf394348 --database cSZcQBnZuHpLU79S85jppV --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS apps (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  app_id VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  app_secret VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  package_name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  icon VARCHAR(255),
  status INT DEFAULT 1,
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  deleted_at DATETIME DEFAULT NULL
);
